column5: Well this is great, up here on Eagle and lcx 111 gps is not responeding and the new 7 Hook I bought before leaving apparently you need to down load maps ? I guess I don't understand why a US/Canada card is NOT preloaded ? Side note we hammered the Lake Trout in Clearwater yesterday
Did you go up the creek? How was it? I'm hoping to get up there this year, Scott has never been up there.
How deep did you find the fish. Heading to Eagle in 3 weeks and hope to make it to Clearwater. PjShorthorn.
Bring some boots for the portage trail.........
Well that is a pisser....how about you drop your snow machine there ? I' m sure I can figure out how to tear some stuff off of it too PjShorthorn.

Yes sir got pretty shallow at the end.Quote: Originally Posted by pjshorthornHow deep did you find the fish. Heading to Eagle in 3 weeks and hope to make it to Clearwater. PjShorthorn. Pj,we fished in 35'-52' around the little island,tried long lining with 3oz. weights but ended up doing better with downriggers so we knew exactly how deep we were. I sure that wooden boat of gord would have no problems getting back that
Thanks for the info.I don't mind a good butt whoop'in when deserved ,but taking that cedar strip boat of Gord's may be something I couldn't survive. PjShorthorn
